requirements_en.minimum:

  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo or higher

requirements_en.recommended:

  • Processor: 2+ GHz Processor
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL ES 2.0 hardware driver support required for WebGL acceleration. (AMD Catalyst 10.9, nVidia 358.50)
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

results.name: ROMANCE OF THE THREE KINGDOMS 8 REMAKE

requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows® 10/11 64-bit (Note: Windows®11 system requirements apply when using that OS.)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4460 or higher
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 660 (2GB) or better, AMD Radeon R7 370 (2GB) or better
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 40 GB available space
  • Sound Card: 16-bit stereo with 48KHz playback for WAV files
  • Additional Notes: Information based on a display resolution of 1280x720, a frame rate of 30FPS, and the lowest CG quality settings.
requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows® 10/11 64-bit (Note: Windows®11 system requirements apply when using that OS.)
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-7700K or higher, AMD Ryzen 3 3100 or higher
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1660 (6GB) or better, AMD Radeon RX590 (8GB) or better
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 40 GB available space
  • Sound Card: 16-bit stereo with 48KHz playback for WAV files
  • Additional Notes: Information based on a display resolution of 1920x1080, a frame rate of 60FPS (30FPS during combat), and the standard CG quality settings.
